text: Witch Hunt is a 1994 television fantasy horror comedy movie directed by Paul Schrader and starring Dennis Hopper, Penelope Ann Miller, Sheryl Lee Ralph, Julian Sands, Eric Bogosian, Valerie Mahaffey, John Epperson. It is the sequel to the 1991 movie Cast a Deadly Spell. ==Other websites== * * Category:1994 comedy movies Category:1994 fantasy movies Category:1994 horror movies Category:1990s fantasy-comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American horror movies Category:Television movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Schrader
title: Witch Hunt (1994 movie)
